text: lkmal hdha aldiyn watdah ayatih la yuhtaj 'iilaa al'ikrah ealayh liman tuqbl minhum aljzyt, faldlayl bayinat yatadih biha alhaqu min albatl, walhda min aldlal. faman yakfur bikuli ma eubid min dun allah wayuamin ballh, faqad thabat wastqam ealaa altariqat almthla, wastmsk min aldiyn baqwa sbb la ainqitae lh. wallah samie laqwal ebadh, ealim bafealhm wnyathm, wsyjazyhm ealaa dhlk
